Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games. Their goal is to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding their reach and distribution. Elvárások / RequirementsSkills that drive success in this role
Java, clean coding skills. Some of our most impactful changes are done on the software backend side of the services that we run and we use Java even for the automation of our platform itself.
Spring Boot. We provide standardised service setup to other dev teams and this industry standard framework is an integral part of it.
Unix/Linux/Bash. Managing virtual servers and related virtual cloud infrastructure is at the core of what they do.
Docker, application containerization. A docker container is our standard unit of deployment.
SQL, MySQL. They manage and provide various data storage services to other dev teams, SQL databases are one of the main technologies in this area.
Kubernetes, Helm. They continue migrating more of their services into our cluster environment where deployment and other usual tasks are fully automated.
Ability to decompose problems and changes into small incremental steps. They use agile approaches to software development, and platform is no exception. They aim to deliver changes and results in small and safe incremental changes.
A critical mindset and a strong problem-solving ability. We work with complex systems using complex technologies and they rarely see the same problem twice.
Balancing autonomous work with clear communication with peers. Every team member has the opportunity to fully own and drive their own projects, but they don’t work alone. Peers are always available to provide feedback and discuss possible approaches.
Additional skills useful in this role
JUnit/TestNG
CI/CD pipelines, Jenkins, Git
GitOps (Flux)
IaaS platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, ...)
Further requirements
Educated to degree level in computer science or related discipline, or relevant experience in the field
5+ years of experience in software development or Ops/DevOps
Ability to visit our office in Budapest on an ad-hoc/monthly/weekly basis
Professional working proficiency in English
 Amit kínálunk / OfferYou’ll be part of our efficient, technology obsessed, and collaborative Platform Engineering team where you will be designing, building and maintaining solutions that extend our AWS cloud-based platform with new features. As part of the role, you’ll have the opportunity to dive deep into all parts of our platform and participate in our journey to build a strong foundation for all of services and technology solutions.
We’re now looking for an enthusiastic and experienced individual to join their team in Budapest, Hungary. You’ll be part of a distributed remote team with a strong culture of openness, transparency, and kindness. You’ll have the opportunity to closely work with and learn from experienced senior team members on a daily basis. They’re a cross-functional team that combines areas of backend Software Engineering and infrastructure Ops/DevOps.
Key activities
Research, design, build, improve, and automate the next iteration of the Flexion platform
Improve the developer experience of their product development teams by providing a streamlined set of tools, standards, and processes for application development, continuous integration, development environments
Build robust, scalable, easy-to-use and easy-to-understand platform solutions used by other software developers in their daily work
Implement performance improvements and optimizations of critical parts of their services
Take a key role in migrating remaining functionalities from monolithic application setup to microservices design and deployment
Create highly scalable software solutions for serving tens of millions daily request from across the whole world
 Kapcsolattartó / InformationA wide range of learning opportunities. They work in many different areas, and even their most senior members never stop learning new technologies and approaches. They learn from each other and they join courses online and on-site. Their team members have various certifications acquired through and funded by the company.

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentBecause of the rapidly changing environment, our Partner has set its aim to become the most data & technology-driven airline in the world. Changing our way of working, modernizing our technology stack and architecture and the right positioning of people is key to achieving this ambition.We have organized our product teams around business processes, where together business and IT are end-to-end responsible for the digital products and services that support our operation.We are looking for a software engineer specialist in Python, who together organize all necessary engineering tasks and help maximize the flow of value. As a software engineer, you will work shoulder to shoulder with other software engineers, like backend specialists, front-end specialists, domain experts, and frontline staff to shapethe future of the firm and the aviation industry.Elvárások / RequirementsWe are looking for passionate and talented frontend engineers, for curious builders who are biased towards action, communication and are thriving in a fast-paced and international environment.We have found that people who match the following requirements are the ones who fit us best:
Preferably Bachelor degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering or other relevant fields
Prior experience with Python and it’s ecosystem (e.g. MyPy, FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy)
Experience with databases (e.g., design) and SQL
Experience with consuming APIs and knowledge of REST API best practices
Knowledge of continuous integration/continuous deployment techniques and tools (Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Bamboo)
Proficient with automated testing (e.g., Unit tests, End-2-End tests)
Experience with bringing (data science and/or operations research) models to production and supporting data scientists in industrializing their code
Experience in coaching and knowledge sharing to familiarize teams with software engineering best practices
Knowledge with and experience in agile way of working (e.g., SAFe, Scrum, Agile)
Great communication skills, written and spoken (English) and team spirit
This role requires participation in our on-call support rotation every six weeks
All our teams have a hybrid way of working, we do ask you to come to the office every so often to meet your colleagues, to participate in trainings or team events.
In addition, the following requirements are considered nice to have:
Affinity with Operations Research and/or Machine Learning concepts
Experience with architecture design
Experience with other general purpose programming languages (e.g., Scala, Java, TypeScript)
Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
Amit kínálunk / OfferAs a Python Specialist, you will apply your skills to change the way our Partner works, driving innovation and transforming us into a truly data-driven organization. We value both technical expertise (analysis, design & architecture, engineering, quality assurance and DevSecOps) as well as the interpersonal parts of the job (coaching, consulting, coordination, and support).
As a Python software engineer, your key result areas are:- Make use of right technology and govern architecture for products in line with the organizational objectives,
- Ensuring that the right technologies are chosen to strike an optimal balance betweenachieving business goals,
- Realizing functional and technical requirements, and managing technical debt,development costs and continuity costs,
- Design and implement the overall architecture aligned with other optimizers for the product to deliver,
- Translate business needs into compelling products and deliver them to end users so that business value is created, 
- Take care of specification, design, engineering, testing, delivery, maintenance, monitoring, and support of digital products,
- Foster a culture where state-of-the-art approaches, tooling and technologies are applied as fits with the mission of the department, the KPI’s and desired business impact.Kapcsolattartó / InformationOur Partner offer a dynamic and challenging position in the heart of the firm's Operation department. The role provides opportunities to apply leading edge craftsmanship and enable impact across our organization. You will be working with talented, driven people within and outside your field, on cutting-edge technology and with top-level equipment. You will be part of the broader community, information sessions, hackathons and more.
We are an international European corporate looking to grow in Hungary. This means you will be able to rely on the resources of our Amsterdam HQ, and we will invite you every three months to the Netherlands for our quarterly planning events. In Hungary on the people side we are very new, being part of a growing neworganization brings opportunities and we will help you to grow with us.
We offer a clear career path with ample opportunity for growth. You will have a hierarchical and a functional manager, your functional manager will also have a software engineering background and therefore we will be able to truly help you develop both your soft and hard skills.In your further development you can choose to either grow into a Principal Engineer, or transition to an Engineering Leader (a partially managerial role).
Additionally, we offer:
- A competitive salary depending on your level and experience- 10% of your time set aside for personal learning and development- An excellent pension scheme, profit sharing, and yearly bonus- Substantial discounts on flight tickets (after 6 months of employment)
- A travel allowance- Discount on health insurance- A learning budget

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is a global leader in the chemicals industry, they are manufacturing products that are essential to everyday living.

Experience in testing IT General Controls (ITGCs), Key Reports (IPEs), and/or Application Controls
Strong research capabilities to quickly understand technologies and be able to develop audit programs
Highly motivated, reliable, accurate and able to work independently
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Sound understanding of processes, risks, and controls
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills and ability to pay close attention to details
Flexible and adaptable to changing schedules and work assignments
Proficient in Office 365 applications
Bachelor’s degree or higher in Management Information Systems, Computer Science, Mathematics, Accounting, Business, Finance or related disciplines
Nice to have:
SAP experience
Root cause analysis
Has obtained or is willing to pursue professional certifications such as Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA), Certified Information Security Professional (CISSP), and/or Certified Internal Auditor (CIA)
Eager to stay current with Cybersecurity and IT Governance trends
Understanding of internal control frameworks, such as COBIT, ISO 27001, NIST Cybersecurity Framework, etc.
Identify areas for improvement including simplification and automation of controls or audit processes
Experience with Data Visualization Software and data extraction preferred 
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Participate in standard to complex audit projects (strategic, operational, compliance) in accordance with department protocols
Responsible for auditing IT controls and all aspects of the related documentation, walkthroughs, testing and issue resolution
Conduct annual tests of ITGCs over financial reporting required under US SOX
Review third-party assurance using recognized standards (SOC 1 Type 2, SOC 2)
Assist in integrated audit projects by working with the business audit team
Develop effective relationships to ensure strong understanding of IT organization and the business
Support the data analytics team on different ad-hoc engagements. When required, work as part of a small team to participate in assurance reviews and investigations.
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Cafeteria and Private Health Care Insurance
Flexible working arrangements and home office possibilities
Structured onboarding support
Diverse career paths (people management, subject matter expert)
Development opportunities (language courses, online learning courses)
Company and team events and possibility to join social groups

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentGlobal Technology Services (GTS) partners with the Aegon businesses to provide global IT standards and governance, global IT procurement services, and IT infrastructure, application, and cloud support services.
From 6 locations in the US, the Netherlands, UK, and Hungary, the company support 20+ country units and 24000+ employees in the world. All of these teams work closely together to provide innovative and digital solutions as well as critical technology support.This is essential for enabling businesses around the globe to be innovative, digital and competitive, efficient and effective and to provide the best solutions and customer experience for our customers and shareholders.
The Intermediate Service Management Analyst is responsible for supporting the delivery of critical services for each team that comprises Production Support. Service Management practices include Problem Management; Knowledge Management, Incident Management, Change Enablement, Capacity, Availability and Performance Management and Service Introduction.Elvárások / Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related degree or equivalent work experience and minimum of 2-4 years technical enterprise work experience.
Experience in change management in multinational environment
Excellent time management skills including the ability to juggle multiple priorities simultaneously.
Strong decision making and problem-solving skills.
Ability to stay committed to the task even during times of frequent change or information delays.
Comfortable working with multiple teams.
Strong verbal and written communication skills.
Accurate and precise attention to detail.
Able to build strong interpersonal relationships with teammates, leadership, senior management, and internal and external stakeholders.
Proficient computer skills, Microsoft Office Suite; working knowledge of software development.
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Understands and follows standards, policies, and procedures.
Knows fundamental process management based on ITIL and business analysis skill set. 
Design and develop user training and job aids
Develops testing plans to confirm processes are in alignment with operational requirements
Seeks to understand impact of actions on others (team, GTS, other business unit customers)
Communicates in a way that demonstrates appropriate timing, audience, content, and method
Works to identify optimal solutions or root cause of issues
Competency in gathering, analyzing, classifying, and documenting requirements
Possesses and applies comprehensive knowledge of Enterprise process and procedure issues.
Participates successfully on a project team with minimal assistance.
Works from established procedures with limited instructions
Performs varied work, requiring some originality
Makes recommendations for changes to procedures
Effectively applies fundamental concepts of function
Working knowledge of project management concepts, able to manage subsets of project tasks
Kapcsolattartó / Information

Flexible working hours

Highly people-centric environment

Senior Red Team Operations & Penetration Testing állás Budapest
Mérnöki / Ipari programozás állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAegon Global Technology Services (GTS) provides IT infrastructure and application support services to the Aegon businesses. GTS is responsible for the provision, support and ongoing maintenance of IT operating platforms, applications and services. There is also a strong connection with external providers necessitating vendor and service provider management. GTS is responsible for driving the technology strategy and providing IT infrastructure solutions that are in alignment with business objectives and the GTS technology strategy.Elvárások / Requirements
Do No Harm approach: operational objectives cannot come at the expense of others
Growth Mindset. Excited for opportunities to solve new problems every day
Helpful demeanor. We are trusted adversaries and that trust needs to remain strong
Customization of Adversarial Tools: Cobalt Strike BOFs, Mythic Agent profiles, and adding new exploits to MSF are examples
Defender experience and knowledge. Utilizing Splunk and finding risks
Web application penetration testing assessments
Email, phone, or physical social-engineering assessments
Developing, extending, or modifying exploits, shell code or exploit tools
Network penetration testing and manipulation of network infrastructure
Relevant, recent and verifiable experience in information security and adversary simulation
Detailed knowledge of global cyber threats, threat actors, and the tactics, techniques and procedures used by cyber adversaries, specifically those targeting the financial services sector
Experience with Red, Blue, or Purple teaming exercises
Industry certifications such as OSCP, OSCE, OSWE, GPEN, GCIH, GWAPT, or GXPN
Five + years cyber security engineering experience
Ability to define and communicate complex technical risk problems, concepts and situations to multiple skill levels; including business personnel with little to no cyber experience
Proficiency with Microsoft Office, Preference given to candidates with deep Excel and PowerPoint skill sets
Experience with systems such as Service Now, JIRA, and equivalent
Ability to fluently read, write and speak English
Experience with leading group discussion and presenting to varying levels and audiences
Self-motivated and self-management skills
Preferred Skills, Education and Certifications:
Strong knowledge of Penetration Testing and covert Red Team operations and Information Security demonstrated by one or more of the following:
Bachelor degree in Information/Cyber Security, Information Risk, Information Risk Management or equivalent experience
Bachelor degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Information Management or similar four year technical degree or equivalent experience, combined with one or more of the following:
Active Cyber Security certifications
Experience in Insurance, Payments, Banking or other Fin-Tech Industries
Strong preference for candidate with excellent Excel and PowerPoint skills
Amit kínálunk / OfferThis dynamic role requires broad understanding of red team operations and penetration testing principles to support Aegon’s Security program.
As a part of the Red Team team within the global SOC, you will be a part of the Security Operations team responsible for unannounced red team operations and managing penetration tests. The Red Team conducts advanced adversary emulation operations to challenge assumptions and emulate cyber and criminal threat actors targeting or attacking the business.
As a Red Team member, you will participate in the design and execution of campaign-based security operations for Aegon, spanning a varying array of targets. Successful team members must be capable of evaluating environments, applications, systems or processes to discover weaknesses, and subsequently leverage those discoveries into actionable real-world attack strategies.
To succeed in this role the candidate will possess breadth and depth of knowledge in security of operating systems, networking and protocols, firewalls, databases and middleware applications, forensics, scripting and programing. Red team members are expected to continuously improve theirtradecraft through research, to add breadth and depth to their knowledge.
What You Will Do: 
Find new and creative ways to break technology through either Red Team or Purple Team operations
Plan, scope, and implement large scale covert operations that have sophisticated goals and significant impact
Develop new adversary tools, techniques, or methodologies
Threat Hunting opportunities to partner with the teams Threat Hunters, using our special adversarial talents to discover and eradicate threats
Engagement in all phases of Red Team security operations
Work within the Red Team to perform physical exploitation, network exploitation and social engineering assessments against authorized targets
Perform network reconnaissance and open source intelligence gathering
Configure and safely utilize attack tools, tactics, and procedures against authorized targets
Develop scripts, tools, or methodologies to enhance red teaming capabilities
Effectively communicate findings and strategy to client stakeholders including technical staff, executive leadership, and legal counsel
Provide risk-appropriate and pragmatic recommendations to correct identified flaws, vulnerabilities and misconfigurations
Lead projects in mid to high level complexity
Mentor other more junior members of the team
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Brand new office at excellent location;
Training and career opportunities;
Competitive salary
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAegon Global Technology Services (GTS) provides IT infrastructure and application support services to the Aegon businesses. GTS is responsible for the provision, support and ongoing maintenance of IT operating platforms, applications and services. There is also a strong connection with external providers necessitating vendor and service provider management. GTS is responsible for driving the technology strategy and providing IT infrastructure solutions that are in alignment with business objectives and the GTS technology strategy.Elvárások / RequirementsRequired Qualifications:
Bachelor degree in a related business field or equivalent knowledge.
Minimum of 2 years previous related work experience.
Knowledgeable of security processes, ability to maintain regulatory compliance, detail-oriented, results-driven, with exposure to common technology environments.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with application security, base understanding of compliance, regulatory, and best practices for access controls.
Experience with Active Directory, mainframe, client-server, and web-based application is helpful.
Advanced communication and customer service skills.
Ability to work in a team environment, adapt quickly to change, and learn new applications, environments, or processes.
Aptitude to learn and apply Technology.
Exposure to operational risk practices.
Amit kínálunk / OfferYou will be responsible for implementing, monitoring, and processing security requests for various business applications on multiple platforms, following best practice, regulatory, and compliance standards for Access Controls.
Key Duties, Accountabilities, and Responsibilities:
Process and respond to requests submitted, abiding by application security guidelines, procedures, compliance, and regulatory needs
Performs all procedures necessary to ensure adherence to access controls best practices for business applications.
Must be able to manage multiple activities at the same time
Interfaces with the user community to understand application security needs, modifies procedures following compliance standards. Identify potential threats and responds appropriately.
Ensures that user community understands and adheres to necessary procedures to maintain compliance.
Conducts accurate evaluation of level of security required
Review, recommend, and implement changes to procedures and systems to enhance application security and efficient processing. Provides management with status reports on activities.
Provide general support for applications as they relate to security functions.
Interact and maintain effective relationships and helps develop documentation as new processes and procedures evolve.
Understands and may participate in or facilitate audit process (gather data, explain processes/procedures) for compliance of systems, standards, and processes.
Effectively applies fundamental concepts; works on assignments of moderate scope and complexity, with limited oversight; makes recommendations for changes to procedures, and performs varied work, requiring some originality or ingenuity.
Other duties as assigned based on divisional needs.
Conforms with and abides by all regulations, policies, work procedures, instructions, and all health and safety rules.
Exhibits regular, reliable, punctual, and predictable attendance.

IT / Dev architect  állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAegon Global Technology Services (GTS) provides IT infrastructure and application support services to the Aegon businesses. GTS is responsible for the provision, support and ongoing maintenance of IT operating platforms, applications and services. There is also a strong connection with external providers necessitating vendor and service provider management. GTS is responsible for driving the technology strategy and providing IT infrastructure solutions that are in alignment with business objectives and the GTS technology strategy.Elvárások / RequirementsWhat You Will Need:Qualifications;Four-year Computer Science or related degree, or equivalent work experience;3 or more years of experience including 2 years of experience in supporting enterprise-level platform installations;3 years of experience working with cloud providers (Azure/ AWS, etc..);At least 2 years of experience with Agile development and planning methodologies;2-3 years of experience working in a high performing DevOps team or role;2-3 years of experience in performance monitoring, alerting and troubleshooting in an enterprise;Strong, holistic understanding of the internet and hosting from the network layer up through the application layerPreferred:Experience working in roles with a strong focus on security, including automated alerting and response;Demonstrate a strong understanding of API’s and API Security;Demonstrated ability in automated code testing;Certifications in relevant technologies, methods, or platforms;Demonstrate the key critical behaviors of commitment to task, communication, customer focus, decision;Making/problem solving, tolerance of ambiguity, planning, prioritizing, and goal settingAmit kínálunk / OfferWhat You Will Do:Develop, Deploy and Support Cloud Infrastructure, as code artifacts or modules;Design, Build and Maintain Cloud infrastructure and applications;Support and deliver using Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery pipelines;Design and Support resiliency and scalability using AWS and other cloud platforms;Enable systems with automated monitoring and alerting;Support the Team and Customers with day-to-day requests, Change and Incident tickets;Support Technology stack refresh on Systems (end-to-end) when required;Ensure automated security is built into each technology stackKapcsolattartó / InformationVery good development opportunities in a global company;Workplace in a pleasant atmosphere with motivated and team-oriented colleagues;Diverse and interesting tasks and projects;Competitive salary

Mérnöki / Ipari programozás állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentIf you are interested in IT security, the challenges of digitalization, and care about consistent user interfaces: we are looking forward to your application! Our Client for more than 20 years has been the preferred strategic partner for demanding security solutions of renowned customers in the area of banking, insurance, and government. They offer a solution-oriented and uncomplicated corporate culture with flexible working hours, plenty of room for initiative, development opportunities, and attractive employment conditions in a forward-looking and dynamic company. The Company's product portfolio is being further developed and adapted to new technology trends to meet the constantly evolving requirements of digitalization. That's why we're looking for you.Elvárások / Requirements2+ years professional experience with cloud-native development

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games! They are a dynamic and experienced team in London and Budapest who have set theirselves the goal to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding reach and distribution. They went public on Nasdaq in Stockholm in 2018 and since then they have been picked by Prolific London to be in the top 5 most valuable London based gaming startup.
At the core of their business is their patented technology that makes it possible to add, modify or remove features in compiled games to make them compatible with the requirements of any store without source code change. The technology does not require game developers to do any redevelopment work and does not require access to the game’s source code. It can enhance existing applications by adding features and functionality, such as gifting, in-app billing and several other solutions, primarily to drive revenue and user engagement.Elvárások / RequirementsTechnical skills:

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentAt our Client they are on a mission to modernize voice with trust, identity, and intelligence. They are protecting everyday people from spam and fraud calls, connecting businesses with their customers, and helping carriers secure their networks for all. In 2015, the Company founder saw the increasing need for innovation in the voice channel and began building the first caller ID and spam blocking apps for mobile while at Whitepages. In early 2016, the Company spun out of Whitepages and brought its technology to market through Samsung Smart Call, the first-ever network-based spam solution with AT&T, and the our Client's consumer app. Three years later in 2019, they brought our Client connect to market, a B2B branded call service that enables enterprise companies to connect to the consumers they are trying to reach. The combination of Protect, Connect, and the app has resulted in the world's largest Voice Performance Platform with over 200M monthly active users.Elvárások / RequirementsExperience or interest in functional programming in a typed setting; 
A philosophy of iteration and continuous improvement;
Experience building highly scalable and -available production services;
BSc or M.S in a relevant field; 2+ years relevant work experience;
Excellent communication and self-organization skills incl. working within and with other remote teams;
Familiar with data storage- and processing systems (such as Postresql, Amazon DynamoDB, Amazon Redshift, Apache Spark, ElasticSearch, Redis);
Experience with *nix.
Proficient at collaborating and communicating with both local and remote team members in English and Hungarian

Scala
Cloud environments (AWS)

High performance HTTP APIAmit kínálunk / OfferAbout the Position
The Backend Engineer is an Individual contributor position responsible for designing, coding and operating high performance data processing systems and backend services for their customer facing web services on the JVM platform (primarily Scala). Our ideal candidate would have the skills and desire to understand their entire stack, from their cloud platform (AWS) through data storage technologies (such as DynamoDB, Redshift) and stream processing (Kafka) all the way to Scala/akka based services.
About the Team
Our Client's Protect team has built a leading fraud detection system for phone calls used by millions of users around the Globe through mobile and network integrations. Their mission is to eliminate unwanted calls and bring trust and intelligence back to the phone calls by using modern technologies and machine learning. Their innovative platform is able to process hundreds of thousands requests and runs half million models per second.
What You’ll Do
Work at a supportive and fast-growing startup with a fantastic team.
Build and operate world class services in the field of phone fraud detection
Make an impact in the lives of tens of millions of consumers on a daily basis
Collaborate and learn from other great team members.

DevOps Engineer in Platform Engineering állás Budapest

IT management állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games. Their goal is to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding their reach and distribution. Elvárások / RequirementsEducated to degree level in computer science or related discipline, or relevant experience in the field
5+ years of experience in Ops/DevOps or software development
Ability to visit our office in Budapest on an ad-hoc/monthly/weekly basis
Professional working proficiency in English
Skills that drive success in this role:
Unix/Linux/Bash, setting up and managing virtual servers. Managing virtual servers and related virtual cloud infrastructure is at the core of what we do.
Docker, application containerization. A docker container is our standard unit of deployment.
Clean coding skills. We are always expanding the areas where we apply the “infrastructure as code” approach. We write new code and we carefully review the code of our colleagues, ranging from small infrastructure automation scripts, continuous integration support, to more complex backend code.
Kubernetes, Helm. We continue migrating more of our services into our cluster environment where deployment and other usual tasks are fully automated.
SQL, MySQL. We manage and provide various data storage services to other dev teams, SQL databases are one of the main technologies in this area.
Ability to decompose problems and changes into small incremental steps. We use agile approaches to software development, and platform is no exception. We aim to deliver changes and results in small and safe incremental changes.
A critical mindset and a strong problem-solving ability. We work with complex systems using complex technologies and we rarely see the same problem twice.
Balancing autonomous work with clear communication with peers. Every team member has the opportunity to fully own and drive their own projects, but we don’t work alone. Peers are always available to provide feedback and discuss possible approaches.
Additional skills useful in this role:
IaaS platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, ...)
JUnit/TestNG
GitOps, CDK, EKS, Flux
CI/CD pipelines, JenkinsAmit kínálunk / OfferYou’ll be part of our efficient, technology obsessed, and collaborative Platform Engineering team where you will be designing, building and maintaining solutions that extend their AWS cloud-based platform with new features. As part of the role, you’ll have the opportunity to dive deep into all parts of their platform and participate in their journey to build a strong foundation for all of services and technology solutions.
We’re now looking for an enthusiastic and experienced individual to join their team in Budapest, Hungary. You’ll be part of a distributed remote team with a strong culture of openness, transparency, and kindness. You’ll have the opportunity to closely work with and learn from experienced senior team members on a daily basis. They’re a cross-functional team that combines areas of infrastructure Ops, DevOps, and full-stack Software Engineering.
Key activities
Research, design, build, improve, and automate the next iteration of the platform
Improve the developer experience of their product development teams by providing a streamlined set of tools, standards, and processes for application development, continuous integration, development environments
Build robust, scalable, easy-to-use and easy-to-understand platform solutions used by other software developers in their daily work
Implement performance improvements and optimizations of critical parts of their services
Take a key role in migrating remaining functionalities from monolithic application setup to microservices design and deployment
Create highly scalable software solutions for serving tens of millions daily request from across the whole worldKapcsolattartó / InformationA wide range of learning opportunities. They work in many different areas, and even their most senior members never stop learning new technologies and approaches. They learn from each other and they join courses online and on-site. Their team members have various certifications acquired through and funded by the company.
Support from a number of domain experts. Members of the team are experts in many different areas, so you will always have someone to turn to for help.
A clear set of priorities, plans, and strategies. You will always know how you can best contribute to the success of the team, the company, and their customers.
A culture of transparency and kindness. They are a diverse company and they openly discuss our views and value everyone’s opinion.
Company share options
Company phone, company laptop
Visits to our London headquarters
Team events, gatherings, conferences
Private Medical Insurance
Travel reimbursement

Szoftverfejlesztő állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Client is a leader in one of the fastest and biggest sectors of entertainment - mobile games. Their goal is to improve and change the mobile games industry forever. They help game developers and distribution channels generate more revenue from games by expanding their reach and distribution. Elvárások / RequirementsSkills that drive success in this role
Java, clean coding skills. Some of our most impactful changes are done on the software backend side of the services that we run and we use Java even for the automation of our platform itself.
Spring Boot. We provide standardised service setup to other dev teams and this industry standard framework is an integral part of it.
Unix/Linux/Bash. Managing virtual servers and related virtual cloud infrastructure is at the core of what they do.
Docker, application containerization. A docker container is our standard unit of deployment.
SQL, MySQL. They manage and provide various data storage services to other dev teams, SQL databases are one of the main technologies in this area.
Kubernetes, Helm. They continue migrating more of their services into our cluster environment where deployment and other usual tasks are fully automated.
Ability to decompose problems and changes into small incremental steps. They use agile approaches to software development, and platform is no exception. They aim to deliver changes and results in small and safe incremental changes.
A critical mindset and a strong problem-solving ability. We work with complex systems using complex technologies and they rarely see the same problem twice.
Balancing autonomous work with clear communication with peers. Every team member has the opportunity to fully own and drive their own projects, but they don’t work alone. Peers are always available to provide feedback and discuss possible approaches.
Additional skills useful in this role
JUnit/TestNG
CI/CD pipelines, Jenkins, Git
GitOps (Flux)
IaaS platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, ...)
Further requirements
Educated to degree level in computer science or related discipline, or relevant experience in the field
5+ years of experience in software development or Ops/DevOps
Ability to visit our office in Budapest on an ad-hoc/monthly/weekly basis
Professional working proficiency in English
 Amit kínálunk / OfferYou’ll be part of our efficient, technology obsessed, and collaborative Platform Engineering team where you will be designing, building and maintaining solutions that extend our AWS cloud-based platform with new features. As part of the role, you’ll have the opportunity to dive deep into all parts of our platform and participate in our journey to build a strong foundation for all of services and technology solutions.
We’re now looking for an enthusiastic and experienced individual to join their team in Budapest, Hungary. You’ll be part of a distributed remote team with a strong culture of openness, transparency, and kindness. You’ll have the opportunity to closely work with and learn from experienced senior team members on a daily basis. They’re a cross-functional team that combines areas of backend Software Engineering and infrastructure Ops/DevOps.
Key activities
Research, design, build, improve, and automate the next iteration of the Flexion platform
Improve the developer experience of their product development teams by providing a streamlined set of tools, standards, and processes for application development, continuous integration, development environments
Build robust, scalable, easy-to-use and easy-to-understand platform solutions used by other software developers in their daily work
Implement performance improvements and optimizations of critical parts of their services
Take a key role in migrating remaining functionalities from monolithic application setup to microservices design and deployment
Create highly scalable software solutions for serving tens of millions daily request from across the whole world
 Kapcsolattartó / InformationA wide range of learning opportunities. They work in many different areas, and even their most senior members never stop learning new technologies and approaches. They learn from each other and they join courses online and on-site. Their team members have various certifications acquired through and funded by the company.

A clear set of priorities, plans, and strategies. You will always know how you can best contribute to the success of the team, the company, and their customers.
A culture of transparency and kindness. They are a diverse company and they openly discuss our views and value everyone’s opinion.

Kapcsolat
IT Product Owner állás Országos
Mérnöki / Ipari programozás állások 
Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentArrayElvárások / RequirementsEHHEZ MINDENKÉPP SZÜKSÉGES, HOGY LEGYEN:
felsőfokú műszaki vagy gazdasági végzettséged;
legalább 3 év scrum csapatban, Product Owner szerepkörben szerzett gyakorlatod;
tapasztalatod szoftverfejlesztési folyamatok működésében,
tapasztalatod változásmenedzsmentben;
kiváló kommunikációs készséged az információk professzionális formában történő átadásá-hoz;
csapatjátékos beállítottságod és alkalmazkodó készséged;
szisztematikus munkavégzésed, rendszerszemléleted és analitikus képességed;
szakmai angol nyelvismereted.
Amit kínálunk / OfferArrayKapcsolattartó / InformationTE VAGY AZ IDEÁLIS JELÖLT SZÁMUNKRA, HA:
fontos számodra, hogy képviselheted a felhasználót, ismered a fejlesztések üzleti követel-ményeit, a megrendelők igényeit;
képes vagy termékben gondolkodni és aktívan tudod támogatni a product manager kollégákat a termékvízió megalkotásában, inputokkal, észrevételekkel, ötletekkel,
a hosszabb távú víziót önállóan tudod kisebb, a csapatod scope-jába illeszkedő, a felhasználó számára is értelmezhető értéket képviselő szállítandókra bontani,
erősséged, hogy átlátod az üzleti célokat, meg tudod állapítani a termékkel szemben megfo-galmazott elvárások fontossági sorrendjét, így folyamatosan képes vagy priorizálni a backlog elemeit,
product owner-ként képes vagy motiválni és segíteni a csapatodat abban, hogy iterációról iterációra a maximális értéket állítsák elő,
a megértett felhasználói igényeket kiválóan le tudod fordítani a fejlesztők nyelvére, így bizto-sítod, hogy a csapat megértse a követelményeket,
tárgyilagosan tudsz döntéseket hozni a szállítás eredményeinek elfogadásáról,
megvannak a technológiai alapjaid ahhoz, hogy a system architect csapat által felvázolt technológiai elvárásokat megértsd, és szakmai vonatkozásában képviseld a csapatod előtt,
a csapat hatáskörébe tartozó technológiai, szakmai irányokat önállóan is meg tudod határoz-ni, azok leszállítását képes vagy lekövetni,
ismerősek számodra a szoftverfejlesztés eszközei, módszerei, technológiai megoldásai és korlátai;
dolgoztál már valamilyen skálázott agilis vállalati keretrendszerben (pl. SAFe),
motivál, hogy tapasztalatoddal segítheted a leendő csapatodat az érett agilis csapattá válásban, a folyamatos fejlődésben,
szívesen képviseled a termékkörödet és a csapatodat a szervezetben, a közös szervezeti agilis eseményeken,
nyitott vagy az új ötletekre és azokat másokkal közösen szereted megvalósítani, fontos számodra, hogy együtt, egymást tisztelve és segítve tudjunk kiváló minőségű termékeket fejleszteni.
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!
Vissza

Tisztelt álláskereső!Ez az álláshirdetés lejárt.Azonban oldalunk több ezer egyéb álláshirdetéssel rendelkezik! Találja meg az önnek megfelelő munkát erre a linkre kattintva!
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentBecause of the rapidly changing environment, our Partner has set its aim to become the most data & technology-driven airline in the world. Changing our way of working, modernizing our technology stack and architecture and the right positioning of people is key to achieving this ambition.We have organized our product teams around business processes, where together business and IT are end-to-end responsible for the digital products and services that support our operation.We are looking for a software engineer specialist in Python, who together organize all necessary engineering tasks and help maximize the flow of value. As a software engineer, you will work shoulder to shoulder with other software engineers, like backend specialists, front-end specialists, domain experts, and frontline staff to shapethe future of the firm and the aviation industry.Elvárások / RequirementsWe are looking for passionate and talented frontend engineers, for curious builders who are biased towards action, communication and are thriving in a fast-paced and international environment.We have found that people who match the following requirements are the ones who fit us best:
Preferably Bachelor degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering or other relevant fields
Prior experience with Python and it’s ecosystem (e.g. MyPy, FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy)
Experience with databases (e.g., design) and SQL
Experience with consuming APIs and knowledge of REST API best practices
Knowledge of continuous integration/continuous deployment techniques and tools (Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Bamboo)
Proficient with automated testing (e.g., Unit tests, End-2-End tests)
Experience with bringing (data science and/or operations research) models to production and supporting data scientists in industrializing their code
Experience in coaching and knowledge sharing to familiarize teams with software engineering best practices
Knowledge with and experience in agile way of working (e.g., SAFe, Scrum, Agile)
Great communication skills, written and spoken (English) and team spirit
This role requires participation in our on-call support rotation every six weeks
All our teams have a hybrid way of working, we do ask you to come to the office every so often to meet your colleagues, to participate in trainings or team events.
In addition, the following requirements are considered nice to have:
Affinity with Operations Research and/or Machine Learning concepts
Experience with architecture design
Experience with other general purpose programming languages (e.g., Scala, Java, TypeScript)
Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
Amit kínálunk / OfferAs a Python Specialist, you will apply your skills to change the way our Partner works, driving innovation and transforming us into a truly data-driven organization. We value both technical expertise (analysis, design & architecture, engineering, quality assurance and DevSecOps) as well as the interpersonal parts of the job (coaching, consulting, coordination, and support).
As a Python software engineer, your key result areas are:- Make use of right technology and govern architecture for products in line with the organizational objectives,
- Ensuring that the right technologies are chosen to strike an optimal balance betweenachieving business goals,
- Realizing functional and technical requirements, and managing technical debt,development costs and continuity costs,
- Design and implement the overall architecture aligned with other optimizers for the product to deliver,
- Translate business needs into compelling products and deliver them to end users so that business value is created, 
- Take care of specification, design, engineering, testing, delivery, maintenance, monitoring, and support of digital products,
- Foster a culture where state-of-the-art approaches, tooling and technologies are applied as fits with the mission of the department, the KPI’s and desired business impact.Kapcsolattartó / InformationOur Partner offer a dynamic and challenging position in the heart of the firm's Operation department. The role provides opportunities to apply leading edge craftsmanship and enable impact across our organization. You will be working with talented, driven people within and outside your field, on cutting-edge technology and with top-level equipment. You will be part of the broader community, information sessions, hackathons and more.
We are an international European corporate looking to grow in Hungary. This means you will be able to rely on the resources of our Amsterdam HQ, and we will invite you every three months to the Netherlands for our quarterly planning events. In Hungary on the people side we are very new, being part of a growing neworganization brings opportunities and we will help you to grow with us.
We offer a clear career path with ample opportunity for growth. You will have a hierarchical and a functional manager, your functional manager will also have a software engineering background and therefore we will be able to truly help you develop both your soft and hard skills.In your further development you can choose to either grow into a Principal Engineer, or transition to an Engineering Leader (a partially managerial role).
Additionally, we offer:
- A competitive salary depending on your level and experience- 10% of your time set aside for personal learning and development- An excellent pension scheme, profit sharing, and yearly bonus- Substantial discounts on flight tickets (after 6 months of employment)
- A travel allowance- Discount on health insurance- A learning budget

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentPartnerünk a minőségi utasélményt új szintre emeléséért dolgozik. Budapesti lokációjú csapatunkba keresünk IT Project Coordinator kollégát elsősorban SAP-val kapcsolatos projektekhez. Amennyiben rendelkezel mély és átfogó SAP szoftver tudással és IT Project Manager képzeled el a jövődet, akkor ez a lehetőség egy remek első lépés lehet. Elvárások / Requirements
Elvárások:
Legyen felsőfokú végzettséged lehetőleg informatikai, vagy villamosmérnök területen vagy folyamatban lévő tanulmányaid.
Magas szintű SAP ismeret és releváns munkatapasztalat (R3 és/vagy S4Hana rendszer ismerete)
1-2 év vállalati oldali tapasztalatod van SAP üzemeltetésben vagy SAP bevezetési projektben.
Ismerd a legfontosabb informatikai rendszereket és folyamatokat.
Természetesen kezeld, ha angolul kell tárgyalnod.
Gondolkodj ügyfélközpontúan, és tudj magabiztosan szervezni.
Ügyesen kommunikálj a felhasználótól a külsős beszállítókig bárkivel.
Légy együttműködő, és nyitott a frappáns megoldásokra.
“B” kategóriás jogosítványodat gyakorlatban is tudd használni.
Előnyök:
Gazdasági, informatikai, vagy villamosmérnök területen szerzett felsőfokú végzettség vagy folyamatban lévő tanulmányok.
SAP R3 és/vagy S4Hana rendszer ismerete.
SAP Success Factors és SAP Ariba ismerete.
BI rendszerek ismerete.
Üzleti rendszerek bevezetésében szerzett projekt tapasztalat.
 Amit kínálunk / OfferFeladatok:
SAP on-premise és SAP Cloud modulokhoz kapcsolódó projektek vezetése és hozzá kapcsolódó IT feladatokat összefogása.
Meglévő rendszereken nagyobb mértékű változtatások, új funkciók kialakítása.
Részvétel nagy komplexitású, vállalati projektekben, IT oldali projekt tagként.
Együttműködés az üzleti területekkel (belső megrendelő), az üzleti folyamatok átlátása, az üzleti igényekhez megfelelő informatikai megoldások keresése.
Kapcsolattartás a SAP fejlesztő cégekkel, SAP tanácsadókkal.  
Együttműködés a többi IT területtel a szerverüzemeltetési, hálózati és cybersecurity kérdésekben.
Az ötlet felmerülésétől, a legjobb megoldás kiválasztásán keresztül a végső megvalósításig terjed majd a feladatod.
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Stabil, hosszú távú munkalehetőség.
Egyedi, különleges munkakörnyezet.
Nyitott, segítőkész légkör, összetartó csapat. 
Hibrid munkavégzés. 
A fejlesztések szinte minden lépése in-house történik, így láthatod egy folyamat minden apró mozzanatát.
Saját kisebb projektek gazdája leszel, így a sikerélmények sem maradnak el.
Folyamatosan bővülő, szakmailag elkötelezett csapat, ahol építheted karrieredet.

Az ISO20000 alapú „Problem Management” és „Change Management” folyamataival összhangban a problémákhoz és a karbantartásokhoz, rendszer változásokhoz tartozó esetek és jegyek kezelése és dokumentálása.
Szakmai kapcsolattartás az informatikai beszállítókkal és a 3. szintű támogatói csoportokkal. Kapcsolattartás a kulcsfelhasználókkal.

Designing, implementing and testing new functionalitiesMaintain the current systemKeeping contact and cooperating with teams located in Hungary and in Germany, ensure smooth and active communication with co-workers and associated partners
You will deal with the following technologies, tools and frameworks:
Java Spring framework (Spring Boot, Spring Data, Spring Security, Spring Integration, Spring Cloud)RESTful servicesMicroservicesOracle, PostgreSQL, SQLHibernateMaven, GitJira, ConfluenceDockerKapcsolattartó / InformationWhat are the benefits of joining Our Partner as an employee?
Even when you work hard, you will still have time for your personal life: their flexible working hours based on core time, the exact observance of the designated number of working hours and the benefits that can be extended to cover your family you can also improve your non-working life!
They have long-term plans for you! They have carefully designed career paths (and a career management system), they provide the appropriate training courses and projects to accomplish your aims.
Their community is characterized by mutual respect and an attitude of helpfulness. This high professional quality level and the colorful personalities will help you spend your everyday life in a good mood, why you make the best of your skills and talents.
In addition to an inclusive and helpful atmosphere, trust is also an important value for the company. You can rely on Our Partner with anything right from your first day.

											We are building multiple development teams for a new, greenfield project which aims to create a new industrial web application primarily for HMI/SCADA systems. The project provides a rare opportunity to create a new web based system using newest technologies for industrial applications. We are looking for fullstack developer trainees to work as part of a scrum team on a greenfield software research project.   •Develop new features C# .NET Core and TypeScript/JavaScript•Maintain code written in C# .NET Core and TypeScript/JavaScript•Write unit test•Maintain existing code base•Actively work in an agile teamExpectations:•Basic C# .NET COre development skills•Basic JavaScript knowledge•Systemic thinking•At least professional working proficiency in English •Version control knowledge Can be a plus:•Web front end development experience (BootStrap, CSS3 etc.)•Advanced understanding of React.js and its patterns•Knowledge of CSS preprocessors, like SAAS & LESS•German language knowledgeWhat we offer:•Home office opportunity and flexible working hours•A young, dynamic, supporting team with mentor•Attractive working environment and secure workplace•Opportunity for international work experience•Various career opportunities•You can join several communities: sport, CSR, green, ToastMasters, etc.•Family Friendly Workplace

											Kik vagyunk mi? A Graphisoft egy világszerte elismert, magyar alapítású szoftverfejlesztő cég. Fő termékünk az Archicad 3D-s építészeti tervezőszoftver világszerte alapjaiban változtatta meg az építészek tervezési és együttműködési szokásait. Az általunk fejlesztett megoldást több, mint 100 országban 200 ezernél is több építész használja nap mint nap. Célunk, hogy a virtuális épületmodell segítségével élvezetesebbé és hatékonyabbá tegyük az építészeti tervezési és kivitelezési folyamatot. Mi lesz a feladatod?•Innovatív termékvonal fejlesztése 5-10 fős csapatokban•Felhasználóknak értéket teremtő funkcionalitások tervezése és implementálása•A programszerkezet folyamatos megújítása•Együttműködés a terméktervező és minőségbiztosítási csapatokkal•Egyedi problémák kreatív megoldása az egyetemi matematikai tudás alkalmazásávalÖrömmel várjuk a jelentkezésed, ha:•Szakirányú felsőfokú tanulmányaid folyamatban vannak, minimum két félévig lesz még hallgatói jogviszonyod•Jól ismered a C++-t vagy más objektum orientált nyelvet, és kész vagy még tovább fejlődni•Angol nyelvű szakmai szöveg olvasása és írása nem okoz gondot•Heti legalább 25 óra munkát tudsz vállalniMiért érdemes nálunk dolgozni?•Meseszép Duna-parti, ősfákkal tarkított, parkos környezetben találod magad•Modern, inspiráló és esztétikus irodaparkban dolgozhatsz•Tág keretek között magad oszthatod be a munkaidődet•Otthagyhatod a kéznyomod a szakma által is elismert, innovatív terméken•Hatalmas programrendszer fejlesztési kihívásain gondolkozhatsz•Befolyásolhatod fejlesztési módszereinket•Javasolhatsz szakmai fejlődésedhez fontos kurzusokat, tanfolyamokat•Országos szinten is egyedülállóan magas szakmai színvonalat képviselő kollégáktól tanulhatsz•Nem maradsz egyedül a problémáiddal, gyorsan találsz konstruktív segítséget•Javaslataidat mindig meghallgatjuk, örülünk a sikereidnek, eredményeidet elismerjükKoronavírus tájékoztató: A koronavírus korlátozások feloldása miatt bevezésre került a NEXT NORMAL hybrid munkavégzési lehetőség. Ennek keretében lehetőséget nyújtunk munkatársainknak, hogyha egészségük és idejük engedi az irodában végezzék munkájukat, ennek helyszíne a Graphisoft SE budapesti irodája. A koronavírus miatt kialakult helyzet azonban bebizonyította, hogy a hatékony munkavégézésnek nem feltétele az irodai jelenlét, így továbbra is támogatjuk a home office munkavégzést, amennyiben munkatársaink ezt igénylik. Ebből kifolyólag a kiválasztási folyamat egyes köreit online tartjuk. Büszkék vagyunk arra, hogy nemzetközivé nőtt magyar cégünk több mint 40 éve innovatív megoldásokkal alakítja az építészet jövőjét! Jelentkezz és ismerj meg minket!

Az általuk fejlesztett termékekkel személyautókban, kamionokban és önvezető autókban is találkozhatunk. A műszaki követelmények egyeztetése belső, illetve külső partnerekkel.

Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentWho is our partner?
Our partner's mission is to provide a tool that makes urban commuting more convenient and contributes to building a sustainable future. Their main product is a mobile application for parking and electric vehicle charging. Furthermore they work closely with big corporations, providing software and hardware related to parking and charging. 
Right now they are looking for their new Software Test Engineer colleague.Elvárások / RequirementsThe requirements you should fulfill:
Completed technical education in the field of IT or engineering
At least 3-5 years of experience in software testing
Familiarity with SQL
Reliable English knowledge
Soft skills we are looking for:
Analytical thinking
Proactivity, good communication skills
Ability to work well as part of a team
It is a PLUS if you have:
ISTQB
Some programming knowledge (preferably in Java or JavaScript)
Familiarity with some testing tools and methodologies (Postman / SoapUI /Selenium / Appium / JMeter)
Experience with an issue tracking system (Jira / Redmine / Testlink / Spira)
User level familiarity with Linux
Amit kínálunk / OfferThe following challenges await the Software Test Engineer:
Designing test scripts and test cases based on given specifications
Conducting functional and user tests
Error analysis, defect tracking and documentation
Taking part in the development and implementaton of new testing methods and principles
Working closely with the software engineer and sales teams
Kapcsolattartó / InformationWhat our partner offers you:
Partial home office opportunity
Competitive renumeration package with stock options and education support
Diverse tasks using modern technologies
A friendly team of young professionals
A chance to join a growing project in an emerging industry

Electrical Engineer or IT degree (BSc/MSc)
On medior level 3+ years of embedded development background
Knowledge of analog and digital hardware for hardware-based programming
Knowledge of measuring tools for developing and testing
Fluent English is a must, German not required but nice to have it
Experience in MATLAB/Simulink/Python/AUTOSAR/MISRA C is an advantage
Engine control system or test system development background is also a plus
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Full cycle ECU (Electrical Control Unit) development, servo control supplement and operation system development in embedded C
Plan and execute embedded systems, prepare software requirements
Implementing and integrating requests coming from clients (automotive industry), internal electronics development and testing
Documentation considering security processes, delivering technical design, end-to-end software implementation, module level testing in C
Keep in touch with architects, software integrators and project leaders
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Mentor programming, have the chance to learn from the most experienced colleagues
Flexible working time
Amazing social environment with friendly, smart and helpful colleagues
Participating in international projects
Providing language courses
Competitive salary and other benefits

Rendszeradminisztrátor - IT infrastruktúra / Syste... állás Budapest
Linux
IT Support állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentHa van tapasztalatod IT üzemeltetésben, úgy érzed megállnád a helyed a kritikus rendszerek működtetésében, profin koordinálnád azokat, és biztos támogatója lennél a partnercégünk infrastruktúrájának, akkor jelentkezz IT infrastruktúra adminisztrátori pozíciónkba.
Partnerünk a minőségi utasélményt új szintre emeléséért dolgozik. Budapesti lokációjú csapatukba keresünk új kollégát. Elvárások / RequirementsElvárások:
középfokú szakirányú végzettség;
1-3 év szakmai tapasztalat IT üzemeltetésben
TCP/IP hálózati ismeretek (például CCNA ismeret)
MS Windows szerver, Linux szerver üzemeltetési ismeretek
legalább középfokú aktív szakmai angol-nyelvtudás
“B” kategóriás jogosítvány, aktív vezetési tapasztalat
ügyfélközpontú gondolkodás
jó problémamegoldó- és szervező-készség
jó kommunikációs készség
önállóság, kreativitás, nyitottság
Előnyök:
felsőfokú szakirányú képzettség (informatikai, vagy villamos mérnök területen)
strukturált gyengeáramú kábelezési ismeretek (optika, CAT-réz)
Amit kínálunk / OfferFeladatok:
Az IT osztály képviselete és kapcsolattartás a cég egyéb üzemeltetési 7x24 órás felügyeletet adó szervezeti egységei felé.
Részvétel az informatikai változások kezelésének koordinálásában, mind a meglévő rendszerek módosítása során, és a bevezetésre kerülő új informatikai rendszerek telepítése és/vagy az infrastruktúrába való integrációja során, „ITIL” alapú „Change Management Process” folyamat alapján.
Támogatás és összeköttetés nyújtása a második vonalbeli támogató csoportoknak (szerver, hálózatok és teklekommunikáció menedzsment), valamint az első vonalbeli támogató csoportok (ügyfélkapu, kliens üzemeltetés) csoportoknak, kiemelten a partner csoportok helyszíni szolgáltatásán kívüli időszakaiban.
Részvétel a kritikus rendszereket érintő hibaesemények megoldásában a „ITIL” alapú „Incident Management Process” folyamat alapján.
A pozícióhoz tartozó műszakrend folyamatos, napi 12 órás (1 nap nappal(7:00-től)-1 nap éjszaka (19:00-től), 2 pihenőnap).Kapcsolattartó / Information
Stabil, hosszú távú munkalehetőség
Egyedi, különleges munkakörnyezet
Nyitott, segítőkész légkör
Hosszú távú fejlődési lehetőség
Egyedülálló, speciális informatikai rendszerek és berendezések

Grafikus gyakornok állás Budapest
Photoshop
Illustrator
Design és grafika állások 
ElvárásokNappali tagozatos hallgatói / diák jogviszonnyal rendelkezel,heti 20 órában tudsz dolgozni,az angol nyelvet középszinten ismered és használod,szeretsz önállóan és csapatban is dolgozni,érdekel a grafikai tervezés világa és szereted a kreatív tervezői feladatokat,követed és szereted az online trendeket,alapos ismereted van az alábbi programok használatában: Powerpoint, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator és InDesign. Pozíció betöltése során előnyt jelent:Egyéb programok ismerete, használata, pl.: Aftereffects, Figma,fotózás, videó készítés és szerkesztés iránti érdeklődés.  FeladatokA Generali Biztosító Zrt. Kreatív és Digitális területe Grafikus gyakornok  munkakörbe keres munkatársat. A Generali kreatív és digitális csapataként a márka egységes arculatáért és vizuális kommunikációjáért, megjelenéséért felelünk: online és offline grafikai anyagokat készítünk mind a külső, mind pedig a belső csatornáinkra. Emellett az online marketing jelenlétünket is erősítjük a közösségi média felületeinken, valamint a Generali Előrelátók Blogon. Emellett részt veszünk az ügyfélkommunikációban és e-mail marketingben is.Feladataid lesznek:belső kommunikációs grafikai anyagok, mini arculatok, prezentáció layoutok elkészítése – logó, szöveg, grafika,külső kommunikációs grafikai anyagok összeállítása – közösségi média hirdetések,fotóanyagok szerkesztése, összeállítása,arculati kézikönyv használata ElőnyökSzámunkra fontos és figyelünk arra, hogy a tanulmányaid össze tudd egyeztetni a munkáddal. Nálunk Te alakíthatod ki a munkaidődet a tanulmányaidhoz igazítva.Határozatlan idővel, diákszövetkezeti foglalkoztatással kötjük a szerződést.Iroda - megújult környezetben, jól megközelíthető, központi helyen, metró mellett, a Generali Biztosító megújult Teréz körúti székházában (1066. Bp. Teréz krt. 42-44.).Rugalmasság - hibrid munkavégzés, heti több nap home office lehetőséggel (1 nap irodai munkavégzés formájában), sőt a kötetlen munkaidőnek köszönhetően rugalmasan oszthatod be az idődet.Fejlődési lehetőség - folyamatosan elérhető belső képzések (We Learn portál, English week), és egyéb számos olyan lehetőségek, ahol bővítheted a szakmai tudásod.Sport -és kikapcsolódás - ha sportolni szeretnél, nem kell messze menned: Váci úti székházunkban fitneszterem található, emellett csoportos sporttevékenységekre is van lehetőséged (pl. Generali Futóklub, TRX, jóga). Római-parti Generali Akadémia és Szabadidőközpontunk is számos kikapcsolódási lehetőséget kínál és nyáron medencével vár.Étkezés - ebédszünetben a székházban lévő saját éttermünkben/büfénkben vagy a közeli szuper helyeken próbálhatod ki kedvenc fogásaidat.Tegyünk jót - munkatársként aktív szerepet vállalhatsz a Generali társadalmi felelősségvállalási törekvéseinek megvalósításában. Egyéb információk:Cégcsoportunk munkatársainak jelentős része jelenleg is otthon látja el feladatait, a visszatérést hibrid munkavégzés formájában valósítottuk meg, és az otthoni munkaállomás kialakításához eszközt és segítséget adunk.Onboarding folyamatunkat teljesen átalakítottuk, új belépőink online ismerkedhetnek meg jobban cégcsoportunkkal és vezetőinkkel, saját területükön pedig a hibrid munkavégzésnek köszönhetően igény esetén személyesen is tudnak tanulni az irodai környezetben.   
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!

Strong communication skills.
Excellent attention to detail.
Familiarity with:
Vulnerability Assessment tools, e.g., Nessus, Qualys, etc.
OS Security, e.g., Unix, Linux, Windows, Cisco, etc.

Advanced knowledge of complex queries for data analysis.

Experience in automation and optimization of repetitive processes and reporting.
Education:
Bachelor’s degree/University degree or equivalent experience
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Maintain oversight of all infrastructure hygiene, vulnerability reporting, and GEM reporting.
Work with vulnerability lifecycle managers, operations and application support teams, and the vulnerability data team to analyze requirements, design and develop specs and manage data which supplies information to all vulnerability threat reporting and analysis.
Create ad-hoc reports for additional management or audit related requests.
Work with partnering organizations to automate manual metrics and reporting.
Support the GEM Operations Lead with ad-hoc requests.
Kapcsolattartó / InformationCompetitive compensation package with extensive benefits:
Private Medical Care Program and onsite medical rooms in our buildings
Pension Plan Contribution to Voluntary Pension Fund
Group Life Insurance

Server and Network Management team leader állás Budapest
Egyéb IT pozik állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur partner is working to take the quality of passenger experience to a new level. We are looking for an experienced professional to join their team in Budapest. As team leader, you will be responsible for managing the Server and Network Management team. 
The team's responsibilities include the deployment and operation of the overall infrastructure of our client, including the 24/7 high-availability campus data network, radio, voice and other communication systems, storage and virtualization server farms, cloud-based IaaS systems, and other IT systems. During the operation, Level 2 and - in the case of some systems -, Level 3 services are provided by the team.Elvárások / Requirements
5+ years overall experience including 1-3 years of experience in a similar team leader position. 
An in-depth understanding of high availability, disaster recovery, multi-site architecture, data center design, virtualization & containerization, network technology is a must.
Candidates must demonstrate the ability to learn on-the-fly, and be able to solve complex problems.
Very good command of English (written and spoken) and native Hungarian (must have)
B category driving licence
Amit kínálunk / OfferResponsibilities:
Manage the group including assignment and prioritization of workload, performance reviews.
You will be responsible for the preventive and reactive maintenance of the systems, in line with the Incident management, Problem management and Change management processes.
Liaise with the Solution Architect team leader and the Business Application Management team leader.
Develop and maintain the group's professional business relationships with IT suppliers and service providers.
Monitoring the performance of the members within your team, and supporting them with a professional attitude in-line with our leadership culture.
Kapcsolattartó / Information
You will have the opportunity to be a part of and manage a highly skilled team of professionals.
You will be involved in the implementation and operation of unique and complex IT systems.
You will be part of the management team.
A vibrant, fast moving work environment.
Home office opportunity.

Senior Data Engineer állás Budapest
Scala
SAP
IT Support állások 
Cégleírás / Organisation / DepartmentOur Partner is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility.Elvárások / Requirements
A Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science
5+ years of experience extracting data from SAP systems, building data pipelines using Azure Data Factory and Databricks Spark using Scala and/or Python
Sound knowledge of Data Warehousing concepts, Data models, and big data lake environment(s)
Proven experience in data analysis and writing data processing rules for ETL/ELT/ process in a warehouse environment
High levels of energy and enthusiasm to work in a multi-cultural global team and work towards common objectives
Amit kínálunk / Offer
Understanding business needs around big data integration, data engineering, and data operations to build end-to-end data pipelines for analytics purposes
Designing and implementing, highly performant data ingestion & transformation pipelines from multiple sources using Azure Data Factory, Databricks, and Spark/Scala/Python
Orchestrate, Automate, and maintain, and testing of Data Pipelines using Azure DevOps.
Continuously improve optimize our data and data pipeline architecture, as well as optimizing data collection and data flow
Work with IT domain teams and business partners, to assist with data-related technical issues and support the end-to-end production operations of data pipelines for our Process Mining team
Kapcsolattartó / Information
Stable company background and long-term working possibility

SEO gyakornok - riportok, dashboardok állás Budapest
Egyéb IT pozik állások 
ElvárásokMivel fogsz foglalkozni SEO - riportok és dashboardok gyakornokként?SEO analitikával és webhelyelemzéssel, amelyek segítségével mindig naprakész lehetsz.Javaslatokat fogsz megfogalmazni a táblázatokból és az adatokból kiindulva.SEO auditok és folyamatos SEO együttműködések menedzselésével.SEO célok folyamatos karbantartásával, stratégia megalkotásával.A minél magasabb rangsorolás tökéletes receptjének elkészítésével és minél nagyobb átláthatóság a riportok segítségével.Ez álmaid munkája, amennyiben:Érdekel az IT, az online értékesítés és a digitális marketing, szeretsz tanulni és új készségeket elsajátítani.Nem teljesen ismeretlen számodra a SEO és a keresőoptimalizálás világa, van projektmenedzseri vagy marketinges tapasztalatod.Nem kell bemutatni neked a Data Studiot, a Google Analytics-et és hasonló Google termékeket.Nem tölt el félelemmel a számok halmaza, a szavak rengetege és a statisztikák sokasága sem.Pontosan, precízen és lelkiismeretesen dolgozol, a határidőkhöz pedig minden esetben tartod magad.Fontos számodra a kommunikáció és a jó hangulatú csapatmunka, nem riadsz meg a közös projektektől.FeladatokNemcsak ismered a mondást “ a Google a barátod ”, de Te úgy is érzed, hogy ténylegesen az?Ha Excel táblákat vagy adatokat látsz hamarabb elkezdesz velük zsonglőrködni, mint a cirkuszban a bohóc az előadás elején?A biztonság kedvéért a legkézenfekvőbb információkat is a keresőbe pötyögöd be, mert csak neki hiszel igazán?Pontosan tudod, hogy az első találati oldalon való szereplésért úgy meg kell küzdenie a weboldalaknak, mint az iskolásoknak a menzás ebéddel?A Moonshot Kft. SEO és Google Ads gyakornok pozíciójában tökéletesen kamatoztathatod a tudásod!Téged keresünk, ha izgatottá válsz az online értékesítés, az analitika és a SEO szavak hallatán, illetve szívesen segítenél ügyfeleinknek minél előrébb kerülni azon a bizonyos találati listán. ElőnyökMire számíthatsz, ha csatlakozol hozzánk?Egy olyan IT cégbe csöppenhetsz bele, ahol mindenünk a csapatmunka, az együttműködés és a jó munkahelyi közeg megteremtése.Kibontakozásra, rengeteg újdonságra és izgalomra, mert nálunk egyik munkanap sem ugyanolyan, mint az előző.Home-office munkavégzésre.Hosszú távú és stabil állásra, fix fizetésre.Tanulási és fejlődési lehetőségre, amely minden munkahetet végigkísér.Várjuk a jelentkezésedet, ha úgy gondolod, szívesen és lelkesen csatlakoznál hozzánk! 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!
Vissza

Cloud Security Analyst állás Budapest
Python
Linux
AWS
Tesztelés állások 
Elvárások Kiváló analitikai- és problémamegoldó készség, nyitottság a tanulásra, dinamikus alkalmazkodó készség.Alapvető ismeretek megléte felhő alapú tecnológiák területén.Programozói ismeretek megléte - főként Python és Powershell területen - valamint alapvető ismeretek a következő területeken: Operációs rendszerek, Hálózati biztonság, Alkalmazás biztonság.Széleskörű ismerete a nyílt forráskódú és kereskedelmi forgalomban lévő felhős eszközöknek.Hasznos készségek a területen, melyek előnyt jelenthetnek:Alap vagy haladó programozói ismeretek script nyelveken (pl. Python, Powershell).További felhőalapú Azure SaaS biztonsági technológiák ismerete.Hálózati biztonsági architektúrák ismerete (pl tűzfalak, DMZ, proxyk, DNS, web/mailszerverek).Professzionális tanusítvány Azure vagy AWS területen, például Az-500, Infrastructure administration, Windows/ Linux, Containers (K8s, Dockers, stb.).Gyakorlati ismeretek az alábbi teületeken: Identity és Access Management, Data Protection és Vulnerability Management.Tapasztalat Azure biztonsági architektúra tervezésében.Tapasztalat biztonsági és kockázatelemzési tanácsadásban.Feladatok Riportok készítése a KPMG ügyfelei számára a felhős infrastruktúrájukról biztonságáról.Felhő infastruktúra tesztelése különféle biztonsági sérülékenységek iránt.Iparági legjobb gyakorlatok ellenőrzése az infrastruktúrán.Komplex előírások és technológiai standardok konvertálása gyakorlati elvárásokká a cloud, hibrid és on-premise környezetekben.Belső technikai know-how fejlesztése, Azure területtel kapcsolatos tudástár (iparági trendek, technológiák, biztonsági ajánlások) naprakészen tartása.Előnyök Professzionális tapasztalat gyűjtése változatos ügyfélkörnél, egy fiatal és dinamikus csapat tagjaként.Fejlődési lehetőség a teszt automatizálás területén.Sérülékenységek kutatása különféle, részben egzotikus rendszereken.Közvetlen tapasztalat alkalmazott biztonsági technológiák területén, és lehetőség a már meglévő módszertanok fejlesztésére.Kiváló fejlődési lehetőség rendszeres tréningekkel.Lehetőség konferenciákon való részvetelre, képzésekre, technikai workshopokra és meetupokra.Versenyképes fizetés és juttatási csomag.Rugalmas munkaidő és home office lehetőség. 
Jelentkezésnél hivatkozzon az Itpeople-re!
